Scheduled Consultation

Adults (18 Above)

Consultation for Adults (18 and above) every Monday at the Barangay Health Center. Please attend for your health and well-being. Thank you!

Date: Every Monday

Time: 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Kids (17 below)

📣 Reminder: Every Tuesday!, is for consultation of children aged 17 and below! Make sure to bring your kids for their regular check-up at the Barangay Health Center. Health is wealth! #HealthTuesday #BarangayHealth

Date: Every Tuesday

Time: 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM

For Pregnant Women

This is a friendly reminder that every Wednesday is our consultation for pregnant Women at the Barangay Health Center. We look forward to providing you with essential care and support during this special journey of pregnancy.

Date: Every Wednesday

Time: 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Senior-citizens

This is a friendly reminder that our health center is dedicated to serving our beloved senior citizens every Thursday. Your health and well-being are our top priorities.

Date: Every Thursday

Time: 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Person's with disability (PWD)

We'd like to remind everyone that Friday is dedicated to providing consultations for Persons with Disabilities (PWD) at our Health Center. Your well-being is our priority, and our team is here to offer support, medical advice, and assistance.

Date: Every Friday

Time: 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Free dental checkup

Join us every Saturday for a complimentary dental checkup at the Barangay Health Center. Take a step towards a brighter, healthier smile. See you there! 😁🌈 #OralHealth #CommunityCare #DentalCheckup"

Date: Every Saturday

Time: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM

What You Must Know

Successful Family Planning

Successful family planning enables individuals and couples to make informed decisions about the number and timing of their children, promoting better health outcomes for both parents and children. It empowers individuals with the choice of suitable contraceptive methods, contributing to improved maternal and child health and reducing the risk of unintended pregnancies. Access to family planning services plays a pivotal role in enhancing reproductive rights, fostering economic stability, and supporting overall well-being within communities.

Having a Regular Checkup

Regular checkups are crucial for maintaining overall health and preventing potential medical issues. These routine examinations provide an opportunity for healthcare professionals to detect and address health concerns in their early stages, often before symptoms manifest. By prioritizing regular checkups, individuals can actively engage in preventive healthcare, fostering a proactive approach to well-being.

Successful Family Planning

A barangay health center serves as a primary healthcare hub within a local community, providing essential medical services and health education to residents. Staffed by healthcare professionals, these centers play a crucial role in preventive care, maternal and child health, and disease management. Through regular checkups, vaccination programs, and community outreach, barangay health centers contribute to the overall well-being of the community they serve.

What You Must Know

Health Tips

Balanced Nutrition

Ensure a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains for overall health and well-being.

Regular Exercise

Engage in regular physical activity, such as brisk walking or jogging, to maintain a healthy weight and promote cardiovascular health.

Adequate Hydration

Stay hydrated by drinking enough water throughout the day to support bodily functions and maintain good skin health.

Proper Hygiene

Practice good hygiene habits, including regular handwashing, to prevent the spread of infections and maintain personal well-being.

Adequate Sleep

Ensure sufficient sleep each night to support overall mental and physical health, as quality sleep is essential for well-being.

Stress Management

Practice stress-reducing activities like meditation or deep breathing to maintain mental and emotional balance.
